name: Abyssal Whip
description: A powerful whip requiring an Attack level of 70 to wield.

name: Ancient Cloak
description: A mysterious cloak that bears the symbol of the ancient gods.

name: Blue Party Hat
description: A rare and festive hat that signifies wealth and status.

name: Dragon Boots
description: Sturdy boots made from the scales of a fierce dragon.

name: Dragon Dagger
description: A finely crafted dagger with a deadly poison reservoir.

name: Dragon Defender
description: A defensive weapon that represents the peak of warrior skill.

name: Dragon Full Helmet
description: A full helmet made from the toughest dragon metal.

name: Dragon Kite
description: A shield emblazoned with a dragon, offering high defense bonuses.

name: Dragon Long
description: A longsword forged in dragonfire, with a keenly sharp edge.

name: Dragon Sword
description: A sword that is both lightweight and capable of swift strikes.

name: Granite Maul
description: A heavy maul capable of dealing crushing blows to foes.

name: Green Party Hat
description: A rare hat that brings cheer and a touch of envy to celebrations.

name: Prayer Potion
description: A potion that replenishes prayer points for prolonged battles.

name: Pumpkin
description: An edible and somewhat spooky seasonal treat.

name: Purple Party Hat
description: A hat that is the centerpiece of any grand celebration.

name: Rune Boots
description: Hardy boots crafted from rune, offering solid protection.

name: Saradomin Sword
description: A two-handed sword blessed by the god Saradomin himself.

name: Scyther
description: A large, reaping tool that has been repurposed for battle.

name: Super Attack Potion
description: A potion that boosts your attack accuracy significantly.

name: Super Energy
description: This potion rejuvenates your energy at an accelerated rate.

name: Super Restore
description: A powerful potion that restores various stats and prayer points.

name: Warrior Helmet
description: A helmet that marks the wearer as a true combatant.

name: Yellow Party Hat
description: The ultimate status symbol at any RuneScape party.
